body: Hi I got banned and I made an appeal to that mail but any1 is responding me why??
body_tagged: Hi I got banned and I made an appeal to that mail but any1 is responding me why??
title: Support@avicus.net

replies.body: It can take some time. If it takes more than a week, I'd resend an email. It's easy for appeals to be lost and buried in all the others.
replies.body_tagged: It can take some time. If it takes more than a week, I'd resend an email. It's easy for appeals to be lost and buried in all the others.

replies.body: Don't worry dude, i got banned and i sent an appeal, they didn't reply after 1 and a half weeks so i sent a second one and they replied:D so just be patient, you'll be back on Avicus soon;)
replies.body_tagged: Don't worry dude, i got banned and i sent an appeal, they didn't reply after 1 and a half weeks so i sent a second one and they replied:D so just be patient, you'll be back on Avicus soon;)

replies.body: As everyone stated above you must wait or resend. A lot of people send appeals every day.
replies.body_tagged: As everyone stated above you must wait or resend. A lot of people send appeals every day.

replies.body: Thanks all i wish i could play avicus again ;)
replies.body_tagged: Thanks all i wish i could play avicus again ;)
